casebody.data:
May 14, 1970

No. —.

Byrne, District Attorney of Suffolk County v. P. B. I. C., Inc., et al. Garrett H. Byrne, pro se, Robert H. Quinn, Attorney General of Massachusetts, and John J. Irwin, Jr., and Lawrence P. Cohen, Assistant Attorneys General, for applicant. Harold Katz in opposition.

D. C. Mass. Stay heretofore issued by the United States District Court for the District of Massachusetts staying its injunction dated May 6, 1970, is extended through May 22, 1970.
